set(ITK_VERSION_MAJOR 4)
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_EXPORT_NAME "${ITKGIFTI-targets}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR "${ITKGIFTI_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR "${ITKGIFTI_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR "${ITKGIFTI_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR "${ITKGIFTI_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR}")
add_subdirectory(gifticlib)
itk_module_target(ITKgiftiio NO_INSTALL)
